title: Закрытый мир
overview: The first international reality show that is completely filmed on phones by its participants from different parts of the world: the United States, China, Russia, Italy, France, Israel, Turkey, Thailand and Bali. Having found themselves in conditions of self-isolation, the characters spend more than a week inside their apartments and share their experience of solving personal, but understandable problems for millions of people. Watch how others spend their time, so as not to go mad yourself.
